attributes.action:
Restart a modern day Dover Patrol

Using ex loyal
Marines and marine police.
attributes.additional_details: Small craft are turning up with migrants etc on beaches all over the south coast.
attributes.background: Action is needed to protect our borders on the coast, small craft cross the English Channel with ease people, drug and weapon smuggling without much chance of being caught. Our protection at sea of the coastline consists of three UKBA cutters which have a coastline of 7000 miles to protect.

rejection.details:
We think your petition is similar to the following petition: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/127883

You might want to consider supporting this petition.
